downloadTitle: Help and Resources Datasheet for Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012
downloadDescription: This datasheet helps you navigate our websites and in-product help, and to understand when to use each resource.
detailsSection:
We know that Microsoft Dynamics AX has many sites and that searching for and locating documentation and resources can be a challenge.
The goal of this datasheet is to help you navigate our websites and in-product help, and to understand when to use each resource.
systemRequirementsSection:
• To view the PDF file, you will need a PDF reader, such as the free Adobe Reader.
  • For information about the system requirements for Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012, see System requirements for Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012.
installInstructionSection:
1. Click Download to download the document in PDF file format.
  2. Save the file to your computer.
